creator: christopher_a_frey@yahoo.com
text:
I suspect that support for Subversion has probably been requested, but if it has
not, please add Core or optional tasks for it.  If it has already been
requested, then could you make an announcement as to when it will be available.

Thanks,

Chris Frey
chris_frey@mgic.com

creator: jan@materne.de
